a:product.a:name: Savvy Plus
a:product.a:shortDescription: Do your banking for a fixed monthly fee and enjoy the flexibility of adding benefits, such as an overdraft facility and Nedbank Greenbacks Rewards membership, when you need them.

a:productAttributes.a:attributeName: Client FAIS Record of Advice|FAISRecordOfAdviceStaffAssisted|ARRANGEMENT|APPLICATIONS|APPLICATIONSCREDITFACILITY|FAIS Client Acknowledgement

a:features.a:name: My Pocket
a:features.a:shortDescription: Saving facility on a current account

a:features.a:name: eNotes
a:features.a:shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

a:features.a:name: No Funds Alert
a:features.a:shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted debit order

a:features.a:name: Debit Order Switching
a:features.a:shortDescription: Debit Order Switching with transactional product

a:features.a:name: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers
a:features.a:shortDescription: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers

a:features.a:name: Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan
a:features.a:shortDescription: The Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan provides cover that will help you to secure a dignified funeral for yourself or your family members. If you choose this option, we'll get in touch with you to finalise the sale.

a:features.a:name: Amex Card
a:features.a:shortDescription: Accelerate your Greenbacks rewards with the Amex Card
